pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Functional Linear Regression with Sparse Step Functions // A method for the Bayesian functional linear regression model (scalar-on-function), including two estimators of the coefficient function and an estimator of its support. A representation of the posterior distribution is also available. Grollemund P-M., Abraham C., Baragatti M., Pudlo P. (2019) doi:10.1214/18-BA1095.
